description: Fixed point reached by iterating the Kempner function A002034 starting at n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: k[n_] := (m=1; While[ !IntegerQ[m!/n], m++]; m); a[n_] := FixedPoint[k, n]; Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 85}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 15 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a025492 n = fst $ until (uncurry (==)) (\(x,x') -> (a002034 x, x)) (n,0)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 09 2012
author: _David W. Wilson_
